siteMetadata.title: csnotehub
siteMetadata.subtitle: Tips for CS, IT, and CpE university students!

frontmatter.title: Inheritance
frontmatter.description: Inheritance is a way to base a class to a parent class. The inherited class inherits the attributes and methods of the parent class.

frontmatter.title: Constructors
frontmatter.description: Constructors are a special type of method in a class. A constructor is defined by declaring a function (a method) inside our class with the same name as the class

frontmatter.title: Functions
frontmatter.description: A function is multiple statements or other functions that are grouped into one. When it is called, the statements and other functions inside are ran.
